options.response: Welcome to the Daemon Shell. I'm Imp, a personal assistant invented by Dr. Hollenfeuer. Type help for more info!
Type ls to list directories. Type cd to enter a directory.
This is Dr. Hollenfeuer's private files. Maybe you should pick a different directory?
This directory holds all of the source code for the DaemonShell
You can use the command "grep [WORD] [TARGET_FILE]" to search a text file. Maybe you can find a clue?
